newsitem.title: BELGIUM: BELGIAN BUDGET - TIMETABLE, INTERNET SITE.
newsitem.headline: BELGIAN BUDGET - TIMETABLE, INTERNET SITE.

text.p: Belgian Prime Minister Jean-Luc Dehaene will present the 1997 budget in a policy statement to parliament at 1500 local time (1300 GMT) on Tuesday.
Dehaene will present the budget to the media at a news conference after his speech to parliament.

From 1600 local time the policy statement and other texts on the budget will be availble on the federal government Internet site: http://belgium.fgov.be and at the E-mail address: P3000@belgium.fgov.be.
